front.title: SAML Enhanced Client SASL and GSS-API Mechanisms

abstract.t: Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 2.0 is a generalizedframework for the exchange of security-related information betweenasserting and relying parties. Simple Authentication and SecurityLayer (SASL) and the Generic Security Service Application ProgramInterface (GSS-API) are application frameworks to facilitate anextensible authentication model. This document specifies a SASL andGSS-API mechanism for SAML 2.0 that leverages the capabilities of aSAML-aware "enhanced client" to address significant barriers tofederated authentication in a manner that encourages reuse ofexisting SAML bindings and profiles designed for non-browserscenarios.
